venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
Friday, July 8th, 7 pm to 8:30 pm
Psychic and Psychological Perspectives on Death


Cost is free with $10 suggested donation

Join Isabeau Esby and Dr. Joel Glenn Wixson, clinical psychologist, as they discuss how death is viewed, managed and emotionally processed in our Western culture.  As a psychic medium, Isabeau will bring her direct experiences with the other side to explain the process one goes through upon dying as well as the purpose of death.  And, bringing to the table a vast amount of experience in narrative therapy, Joel will share counter cultural ideas of what aspects of death he feels are important to recognize and embrace in addition to how people emotionally process the loss of a loved one.  A question and answer session will follow.
item.how_to_find_us: From the I-95, take exit 3 (95 northbound) or exit 3B (southbound) to Route 33 W. The Center will be 2.6 miles on the right, at the corner of 33 and Bayside, in the Gowen's Corner Plaza. The entrance is just to the left of Bayside Custon Frame & Mi
item.why: An intriguing blend of information from both the spiritual and the psychological perspectives.
item.name: Psychic an Psychological Perspectives on Death
